subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Miriam Chan, who was 6 when her family moved to Manhattan from the Bronx, has been around to celebrate all of the Yankees’ 26 World Series championships.
snippet: Miriam Chan, who was 6 when her family moved to Manhattan from the Bronx, has been around to celebrate all of the Yankees’ 26 World Series championships.
